turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm starving! Can you recommend some good takeout options near me? I'm in downtown Austin.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Sure! Based on your location, I can recommend several highly-rated restaurants. For example, there's Veracruz All Natural (tacos), Odd Duck (farm-to-table), and Via 313 (Detroit-style pizza). Do any of those sound appealing?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, tacos sound good, but Veracruz is always so busy and their wait times are insane. What about something less... chaotic? Also, what's good besides tacos, in the same general area?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I understand. Besides tacos, in downtown Austin, I can recommend Uchi (upscale sushi) or Hopdoddy Burger Bar (gourmet burgers). Based on recent reviews, both are experiencing a moderate level of business. Would you like me to place an order for any of these?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Uchi sounds amazing, but it's a bit pricey. Okay, so what's the *absolute best* burger in Austin? I'm willing to drive a little bit if it's worth it.
